attributes.action: expenses past and present of our Government should be investigated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair claimed £7,000 for new roof two days before leaving No.10??? !!!
this needs to be looked at, not only in the present timescale, yet also in the past, I believe it`s diabolical that expenses have been `blacked out`. How long have we... the British public have our leaders in Parliament take advantage of our system and economy in what they are doing for this country? Are you indeed any different to the bankers who helped take this country into rescission? Now it seems you the MPs indeed are taking the British public into a depression!!!!
a full investigation should take place!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
